inclusion.criterion: Participant is willing and able to give informed consent for participation after the nature of the study has been explained
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Male or Female, aged 18- 70 years inclusive
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: In good health as determined by: Medical history
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able (in the Investigator's opinion) and willing to comply with all study requirements
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing to allow his or her General Practitioner and consultant, if appropriate, to be notified of participation in the study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Have previously received any meningococcal vaccine (this will be confirmed with the participant's general practitioner after enrolment)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Have a history of any anaphylactic shock, asthma, urticaria or other allergic reaction after previous vaccinations or known hypersensitivity to any vaccine component
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has high blood pressure and signs of septicemia. He was diagnosed with atypical hemolytic uremic syndrome.
